creditline: Given in honor of Lotus Stack
description: black woven panel with gold horizontal stripe at top and bottom; American eagle with shield, "E Pluribus Unum" banner, arrows and olive branch above crossed flags of U.S. and France-in multicolored threads; woven text in gold: "DRAP DE LYON/ PROPRIETE EXCLUSIVE/ ETOFFE GARANTIE"
title: "Drap de Lyon" panel
